column2: shootingByLocation <- cleanDate %>% drop_na() %>% filter(LOCATION_DESC != "NONE") %>% group_by(LOCATION_DESC) %>% summarize(shootings = n())
multiVariateData <- cleanDate %>% drop_na() %>% group_by(LOCATION_DESC, BORO, Hour) %>% summarize(shootings = n())
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'LOCATION_DESC', 'BORO'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
